title: Mosaicall philosophy grounded upon the essentiall truth, or eternal sapience / written first in Latin and afterwards thus rendred into English by Robert Fludd, Esq.
author: Fludd, Robert, 1574-1637.
notes: First English edition of: Philosophia Moysaica.
"The second section of this treatise" (p. 127) has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
